# es_event_tcc_modify_t | Apple Developer Documentation

Structure# es_event_tcc_modify_t

Mac CatalystmacOS

```
struct es_event_tcc_modify_t
```

## [Overview](/documentation/endpointsecurity/es_event_tcc_modify_t#overview)

TCC Modification Event. Occurs when a TCC permission is granted or revoked.

Note

This event type does not support caching.
